resources.string: Rastrakavi Ramdhari Singh Dinkar College of Engineering (RRSDCE), Begusarai is one of the premier institute of Bihar under Department of Science and Technology, Government of Bihar. RRSDCE Begusarai marked its humble beginning in 2016. The institute is situated around 33 acres of land with all premier facilities. Rastrakavi Ramdhari Singh Dinkar College of Engineering, Begusarai gives a quality education in science, engineering technology and humanities. It is imparting high quality education and values at UG (B.Tech) through its experienced faculty well versed in their respective field of engineering and technology with well equipped laboratories. At present the Institute has five disciplines viz. Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering,Mechanical Engineering and Chemical Engineering and well established departments of Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and Humanities.
